attributes.action: bring all ministers pay rises  and pensions in line with public sector workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would make Gordon Brown less likely to victimise working people by giving them a pay cut every year by using an artificially low inflation rate to lower wages.

rejection.details: there are already petitions on the site about MPs pay
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
